titles.title: DEFENSE Act
DEFENSE Act
Disabling Enemy Flight Entry and Neutralizing Suspect Equipment Act

A bill to authorize the Secretary of Homeland Security or the Attorney General to deputize a State or local law enforcement officer to protect certain events with temporary flight restrictions, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs
